title: Glottography dataset derived from Figueira n.d. "Atlas total de la República Argentina"
description: This dataset provides non-overlapping contemporary language ranges for indigeneous languages of Argentina as depicted in map 1 of Figueira 1982
citation: Figueira, Ricardo. 1982. Atlas total de la República Argentina. In  Chiozza, Elena (ed.) Centro Editor de América Latina.
